## TransformOptions interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Options for rule transformation between DSL levels.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TransformOptions 
```

## Example


```typescript
builder.transform({
  targetLevel: 'dimensional',
  preserveMetadata: true,
  validate: true,
  preference: 'precise'
})
```

[preference?](./change-detector-core.transformoptions.preference.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

'readable' \| 'precise' \| 'compact'


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** _(Optional)_ Preference for handling ambiguous transformation cases: - `'readable'`<!-- -->: Prefer more human-readable output - `'precise'`<!-- -->: Prefer more precise/detailed output - `'compact'`<!-- -->: Prefer shorter output


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[preserveMetadata?](./change-detector-core.transformoptions.preservemetadata.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** _(Optional)_ Whether to preserve original metadata (descriptions, etc.)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[targetLevel](./change-detector-core.transformoptions.targetlevel.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

'intent' \| 'pattern' \| 'dimensional'


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** Target DSL level to transform rules to


</td></tr>

</td><td>

boolean
